text: Tolma is a monotypic genus of Malagasy nursery web spiders containing the single species, Tolma toreuta. It was first described by R. Jocqué in 1994, and is only found on Madagascar. ==See also== * List of Pisauridae species ==References== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Pisauridae Category:Spiders of Madagascar
title: Tolma
